title: Hush [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts and Katherine Fry
brief_description: Beginning and concluding at an airport, “Hush” is about a family living in a caravan park who are estranged from one another by a secret, unspoken crime that involves one of the sisters. Cast includes Hayley O’Donnell, Marieke Hardy, Saskia Post and Greg Carroll.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian College of the Arts and Katherine Fry
